General.Name: Fujian Nanping Sun Cable Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Nanping Sun Cable Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells wires and cables in China. It offers aluminum alloy conductor XLPE insulated power cables, mine rubber flexible cables, control cables, PVC insulated wires, PVC and XLPE insulated power cables, aerial insulated cables, polyolefin insulation wires and cables, as well as metal sheathed inorganic mineral insulated and marine cables, and 220KV cables. The company provides cross-linked polyethylene insulated, plastic power, and overhead insulated cables; special overhead, steel-cored aluminum stranded; B, R series plastic wires, and automotive wires; radio frequency, general-purpose rubber-sheathed, mining, locomotive, nuclear power plant, wind power, silicone rubber insulated cables, and submarine power cables, as well as submarine photoelectric composite cables, and flexible DC submarine cables. In addition, it sells hardware, electrical appliances, and chemical products, general and electrical equipment, instruments and meters, metal, and building materials. Further, the company offers consulting and technical services. Additionally, the company provides accommodation and catering services. It also exports wires, cables, copper rods, and other products. The company's products are used in equipment motors, electrical appliances, and instruments. Fujian Nanping Sun Cable Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Nanping, China.
